I now know why this game and series has lasted in gamer's memories as long as it has. This certainly shows its age, but not nearly as much as I expected. The movement is great, the gunplay is nice, and the flow of the game is spot on. While Black Mesa is arguably the better version, this is still worth playing.

Gordon Freeman is hot

Amazing classic game. Although there is a steep difficulty curve early on, the game is still a master at teaching you mechanics and making you feel smart. The attention to detail is amazing, you can literally turn off lights and dry your hands and the AI will react to your input! I think anyone who is a fan of FPS games should definitely play this game.
The Benchmark for the modern FPS game. What more can be said? An excellent game on it's own, yet completely defines the genre when stacked up against not only the peers of it's time, but also today.
Wonderfull

人们称它为经典，但也只能是经典。或许以现在的标准评判这部跨时代的佳作有失偏颇，但是有些地方还是想提醒下刚入的兄弟。
当天入了捆绑包，当天打了一个通宵把1通关了，可能有配音奇怪的问题，也可能是自己有点分神，某些任务的重要对话一掠而过，有的时候反应不过来，就只能自己摸索下一步该怎么做，某些时候就是一些煎熬（指引真的很少）。
最让我恶心的是最后的boss尼西拉思，我拿着爪子枪蹭了一个小时还是没反应，最后还是查了攻略才打过（我也不确定是不是我错过了什么重要的对话 - -）
还有一个让我十分难受的点，手雷，每次扔出去都感觉它对我恋恋不舍，慢慢悠悠的落到我脚下，顺便带走半条血。
如果以上所述你可以接受的话，这个游戏还是挺不错的，许多关卡都有熟悉的感觉，都能从其他fps游戏中找到影子。
我更愿意称hl1为开创者，而真正发扬光大的，我觉得还是hl2.

HL1 is as brilliant as it is obtuse. Nothing is properly explained and it leaves it up to the player to just figure things out through trial and error, even still most modern games couldn't hold a candle to the level of atmosphere and world building this game managed to deliver way back in the stone ages. Be ready for a good time but come prepared with a Walkthrough or something.
